price: Melekler, arınıp temizlenmiş kimselerin canlarını alırken: Selam size! Yaptığınız amelleriniz sebebiyle girin Cennet'e! derler.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ طَيِّبِينَ يَقُولُونَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna tatawaffāhumu al-malāikatu ṭayyibīna yaqūlūna salāmun ʿalaykumu ud'khulū al-janata bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
